scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-extractors
scripts.build-extractors: find ./src/extractors -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec basename {} \; | xargs -I % rollup src/extractors/% -f iife -o dist/extractors/% --sourcemap
scripts.build-lib: find ./src -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec basename {} \; | xargs -I % rollup src/% -f cjs -o dist/%
